content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I am pleased to discuss the rental price with you. Let's focus on the rental price only. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given that the apartment is unfurnished, in the city center, and close to all important facilities, I propose a rent of 500 Euros.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer, but I am looking for a price higher than that. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering your proposal, I offer 550 Euros.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: While I appreciate your counteroffer, I am still seeking a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Here's my final offer: 600 Euros. I believe this is a fair price considering the location and condition of the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your final offer, and I am willing to agree to this price. I agree to the price of 600 Euros!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 600 Euros! Congratulations, we have a deal. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
